title: Chief Complaint
content: Evaluation of left small finger with locking and catching

title: HPI Spencer

title: Musculoskeletal
content: Skin purging without erythema; moderate tenderness; nodule at A1 pulley; good ROM; well-healed incisions on middle finger.

title: Assessment
content: Status post trigger finger surgery (middle finger)
